content: Only then can I ensure my beloved "Pink Bubble Bullet" will pierce through everything at unparalleled speed.
info: 莎莎关于自己简单背景_莎莎

content:
I, Esassani,
from the Shifting Wind Association!
I'm a tornado on the Astralink!
info: 莎莎关于自己简单背景_莎莎

content:
Before joining the new Astralink,
I used to go on adventures with friends from the Driftingale Association.
The more dangerous the place, the more I loved it!
info: 莎莎关于自己简单背景_莎莎

content:
One hundred percent—
I wouldn't go if there wasn't any turbulence!
info: 莎莎关于自己简单背景_莎莎

content:
Our sailing speed is measured in Lumia,
though I've never really understood how it works.
All I know is—
info: 莎莎关于自己简单背景_莎莎

content:
I exist to resolve crises!
Traveling at Mach 3, I'll smash through all obstacles in my way!
I am... Oh, look, a flutterbee~?
info: 莎莎关于自己简单背景_莎莎

content:
The Association keeps a record
of everyone's chances of running into turbulence.
My chances?
info: 莎莎关于自己简单背景_莎莎

content: Vroom vroom~ I've customized everything in my car down to the last nut and bolt!

content:
Do you know about Soda Pop-Pops?
They're super tasty!
And the best part? You can throw them and they'll turn into Soda Pop-Pops~!
